review: Dr Aditi is highly professional, honest and handles her patients with utmost care. I visited her when I faced severe tooth ache.She advised for a deep cleaning treatment post which I had no signs of any pain. Before consulting Dr. Aditi.. I consulted another dentist Who instantly recommended Root canal treatment for the same!!! I would highly recommend Dr Aditi Sachdev for all kind of dental treatment.
